sentences.en: A calculative example for trans - ducer's accuracy is given in the Appendix.
sentences.cn: 附录中给出了传感器精度指标计算例题.

sentences.en: A severe infection may cause the appendix to rupture.
sentences.cn: 严重的感染可能导致阑尾穿孔.

sentences.en: Acute inflammation of the vermiform appendix is the most common surgical lesion within the abdomen.
sentences.cn: 阑尾的急性炎症,是最常见的外科腹部病变.

sentences.en: Appendix II of this chapter reproduces the form used in Sweden.
sentences.cn: 本章附录Ⅱ转载了瑞典使用的表格.

sentences.en: Christine had to go into hospital to have her appendix out (=  have it removed  ) .
sentences.cn: 克里丝蒂娜不得不去医院切除阑尾。

sentences.en: For convenience, we have also provided a glossary in an appendix.
sentences.cn: 为了方便, 我们在附录中也提供了术语表.

sentences.en: He had his appendix removed last month because of appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 上个月他因患阑尾炎而切除了阑尾.

sentences.en: I have recently had my appendix removed.
Most of those should end up in web appendix.
sentences.cn: 大部分的内容,应该在网页附录处结束.

sentences.en: She's gone into hospital to have her appendix taken out.
The conical configuration of the appendix makes obstruction of the lumen unlikely.
sentences.cn: 阑尾呈圆锥形,不易造成腔内梗阻.

sentences.en: The Errors Appendix also includes useful information about errors.
sentences.cn: 错误附录也包含了关于错误的详细信息.

sentences.en: The manner of this computation is consigned to Appendix 1 . 3.
sentences.cn: 这种计算方法放在附录1.3中.

sentences.en: The vital importance of the early recognition of perforating appendix is unmistakable.
sentences.cn: 能够早期辨明阑尾正在穿孔是极端重要的.

sentences.en: There is an appendix at the back of the book.

trans.tran_en: a small organ near your  bowel  , which has little or no use
